resources.string: Choose the accent color for the CosmoBond face.
BeatBunny wakes up when media plays. We read playback metadata or tempo hints from session progress to find the beat and stay paused when silent.
Tap the ring on-beat to stretch the timer. You lose after three misses or when the timer drains. Fill the meter to win and trigger the Club Carousel celebration.
Ambient mode pauses the overlay. Toggle reduced motion to calm particles and haptics. Mic access is a placeholder only.
Media playback access: required to read playback state/BPM. If prompted, allow access so the mini-game can match your music.
Mic rationale (future): planned for optional on-watch beat detection. No microphone access is requested or started today.
Pet stats stay frozen while paused or ambient. Hunger, energy, and mood only shift while the game is actively running.
Use calmer animations and skip particles/haptics.
Tiny ticks on beat hits (disabled if reduced motion).
Placeholder for a future consented mic path. Disabled in this build.
